data.title: Christopher Reid of Kid ‘n Play celebrating 30th anniversary of ‘House Party’ | HOUSTON LIFE | KPRC 2
data.meta_description: The ‘House Party’ movie franchise released its first film in March of 1990, and it starred Christopher ‘Kid’ Reid and Christopher ‘Play’ Martin of the famous hip hop duo, Kid ‘n Play. Watch as Lauren Kelly takes a walk down memory lane with Christopher to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the film.
data.text:
Published: February 20, 2024 at 1:18 PMUpdated: July 24, 2024 at 2:42 PM

The ‘House Party’ movie franchise released its first film in March of 1990, and it starred Christopher ‘Kid’ Reid and Christopher ‘Play’ Martin of the famous hip hop duo, Kid ‘n Play. Watch as Lauren Kelly takes a walk down memory lane with Christopher to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the film.
